thePaladin:DefaultUncommonSkill.NAME: A Better Defend
thePaladin:DefaultUncommonSkill.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Plated Armor. Affected by Dexterity.

thePaladin:DefaultRareSkill.NAME: For Each Loop x2
thePaladin:DefaultRareSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to all enemies, 2 times.
thePaladin:DefaultRareSkill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to all enemies, 3 times.

thePaladin:DefaultRarePower.NAME: In-Progress Form
thePaladin:DefaultRarePower.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play a TOUCH.

thePaladin:DefaultAttackWithVariable.NAME: Special Strike
thePaladin:DefaultAttackWithVariable.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage [E] times. NL (Deal !thePaladin:ENERGY_DAMAGE! damage total.)

thePaladin:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkill.NAME: Cool 2 Number Card
thePaladin:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable and !thePaladin:SecondMagic! poison to an enemy.
